p: When the DCs were incubated for 6 hours with Alternaria, the expression of costimulatory molecules including CD80, CD86, and HLA-DR was increased. LPS also increased the expression of CD80 and HLA-DR but not CD86 in DCs. Increased CD80 and CD86 expression by Alternaria was significantly inhibited with 0.05% of the essential oil, but the oil did not influence HLA-DR expression in the DCs. The C. obtusa essential oil did not influence the LPS induced CD80, CD86, and HLA-DR expression ( Fig 3).
